name: Candy Fruits - Fruit Drop!
description:
Enjoy This game who based by classic game collecting coin, so you need to move the basket left and right , this game is suitable for all ages, for your friends, parent and all of them can play it .

This game is free for everyone who love fruits game.

Features :

Many Fruits ( 5 fruits ), Funny Music Background
Simple Classic Game
Endless game mode

How To Play

Left side to Make Basket Moving to left
Right Side to make Basket Moving to Right
Catch all Fruits before it past through basket and the game will over

Enjoy it, and don't forget to share it with your friends.
